Class WikiaHomePage

  • java.lang.Object
    • WikiaHomePage

  • public class WikiaHomePage
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class for the "Wikia Home Page".

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) org.openqa.selenium.WebElement addVideoMenuItem
      This is the menu item "Add a Video"
      (package private) org.openqa.selenium.WebElement addVideoMenuItem2
      This is another reference to the menu item "Add a Video".
      (package private) org.openqa.selenium.WebElement contributeButton
      This is the control that, when clicked, brings up an applicable 'menu'
      (package private) org.openqa.selenium.WebElement forgotPasswordLink
      This is the header: The Best Classical Music In The World"
      (package private) org.openqa.selenium.WebElement loggedInAvatar
      This is the logged-in avatar, which when clicked pops up a menu of items
      static java.lang.String LOGIN_ELEMENT_STRING
      The Constant LOGIN_ELEMENT_STRING, used to recognize and to wait for the non-logged in (anonymous) avatar.
      (package private) org.openqa.selenium.WebElement loginButton
      This is the login 'button'
      (package private) org.openqa.selenium.WebElement nonLoggedInAvatar
      This is the not-logged-in avatar, which when clicked pops up the login 'page'
      (package private) org.openqa.selenium.WebElement password
      The password
      (package private) org.openqa.selenium.WebElement rememberMe
      The 'Remember Me' Check Box.
      (package private) org.openqa.selenium.WebElement username
      The username
      static java.lang.String USERNAME_TITLE_ELEMENT_STRING
      The Constant USERNAME_TITLE_ELEMENT_STRING, used to recognize and to wait for the item associated with the Title that identifies the avatar as belonging to the username.
      (package private) org.openqa.selenium.WebElement usernameText
      usernameText.getAttribute("title") will yield the String "{username} - My page" -- where {username} is substituted with the username login credential.
